hotels.title: Brazil: Charming Recife Harbourside Stay with Onsite Restaurant, Bars & Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Perched right on Santa Rita Pier, Novotel Recife Marina puts you in the heart of Brazil's Venice-like Recife - where canals and waterways crisscross the city. This sleek, modern stay offers waterfront views and easy access to historic landmarks including Cinco Pontas Fort and the lively harbour district. Unwind in the rooftop pool, fitness centre or sundeck that will make you forget you're in the city, not to mention views across the marina and the vast Atlantic Ocean. Whether you're coming for business or beach time, this hotel's rooftop terrace and prime location near Boa Viagem Beach means you're never far from Recife's coastal magic.
